features.name: Authentication (NextAuth)
features.description: Email/password registration and credential-based sign-in using NextAuth, with session handling and protected routes.

features.name: QR Code CRUD API
features.description: Create, list, update, delete QR codes; bulk operations; export; scan tracking.

features.name: Custom Domains API
features.description: Endpoint to manage or validate custom domains for dynamic QR codes.

features.name: Dynamic QR Management UI
features.description: UI to create and manage dynamic QR codes with destination URLs, labels, and status.

features.name: Advanced QR Generator UI
features.description: Feature-rich QR customization including foreground/background, gradient, eyes, corners, logo, watermark, and export in PNG/SVG.

features.name: Short URL Redirects
features.description: Short-code based redirect pages for dynamic QR codes, with scan logging.

features.name: Dashboard and Navigation
features.description: Authenticated dashboard, navigation that adapts to auth state, loading states, and error boundaries.

features.name: Supabase Integration
features.description: Client setup and SQL migration scripts for QR and scan tables.

features.name: App Shell and Theming
features.description: Global styles, layout, icons, and theme toggle for light/dark mode.

features.name: Static Pages and Home
features.description: Marketing/home page, not-found, and route-level loading.

features.name: TestSprite Assets
features.description: Predefined test plan, report outputs, and runnable test harness.
